content.html:
Warm Up Activity

Which graph doesn’t belong?

Enter your answer here:

Compare your answers:

A doesn't belong because:

  • It is the only graph that has no maximum or minimum.
  • It is the only situation in which the temperature does not change.


Enter your answer here:

Compare your answers:

B doesn't belong because:

  • It is the only graph that has one maximum.
  • It is the only graph that shows the temperature rising and then falling (but not rising again).


Enter your answer here:

Compare your answer:

C doesn't belong becauses:

  • It is the only graph that has horizontal intercepts.
  • It is the only graph that has one minimum.
  • It is the only graph that shows negative output values or negative temperatures.
  • It is the only graph that shows temperature falling and then rising (but not falling.


Enter your answer here:

Compare your answer:

D doesn't belong becauses:

  • It is the only graph that has several maxima and minima.
  • It is the only graph where the temperature rises and falls several times.
  • This graph shows a repeating pattern.
